name: Love to death
description:
⚠️PLAY FULLSCREEN FOR BEST EXPERIENCE (BLUE BUTTON BOTTOM RIGHT) ⚠️

⚠️AFTER YOUR LOSE, PRESS SPACE TO RESTART⚠️

Intro 👻

Stay alive by healing. 

Death wants to take you away, fight it when you reach full HP! 

LOVE SAVES!

How to play 🎃

MOVE with WASD or ARROWS.

Reach full health in order to eat the ghosts

Team 🧛🧙🧝

Lucas Mattos 

Ernani Rocha 

Danielle Marotta 

Music 🎵

Halloween Funk by Joakim Karud
